ClustalW2
=========

# Available modules


The overview below shows which ClustalW2 installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using ClustalW2, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load ClustalW2/2.1-intel-2020a
```
